title: Climate Change And 2020's Record-Breaking Hurricane Season
description:
The 2020 Atlantic Hurricane season broke records and caused enormous damage. NPR climate reporter Rebecca Hersher talks us through the 2020 season--what was driven by climate change and what it means for the future.

Email the show at shortwave@npr.org.

itunes:summary: The 2020 Atlantic Hurricane season broke records and caused enormous damage. But how much of that was actually driven by climate change, and what does it mean for the future?
